name: Start here.
description: You start your journey into the wonderful peaceful modpack!

quests.name: Armor
quests.description: Ahhh yes you must be asking, "Why can't I make my iron armor yet?", well since you asked, you need to make leather first and then put some metal plates on top of that.

quests.name: Sword making
quests.description: To make a sword better than stone, you'll need to craft it using something better than a stick.

quests.name: Iron ;,D
quests.description: So you found some Iron ore, well is it too late to tell you we rebalanced it? Yup, now you need a kiln before you can get a furnace, with gives you Iron Scraps instead of a full ingot. Combine 3 scraps and you can get an ingot.

quests.name: Stone
quests.description:
Your probably thinking, "well, this looks like minecraft, but I have a weird hotbar and less health", yes you have less health and now your hotbar is a little more special

 1) You need to level up your health by killing monsters and animals, a number will appear next to the red xp bar below your hearts indicating your health level (maximum is 15 in this modpack)

 2) You still have your experience bar, its just smaller and to the left of your hp xp bar

 3) You better hope it isn't getting dark because you will die if you aren't prepared. By default the modpack gives you ONE precious life, and if you run out of lives, its game over, world deleted, player banned. You can gain more lives by completing quests and the zombie killing quest that lets you get half of a full heart, so you aren't completely helpless, but your pretty close. 

(You can check your number of lives left by opening this book)

quests.name: Wood
quests.description: Go mine some wood and then we'll talk.

quests.name: Leather
quests.description: You are going to need to gather leather, you won't be able to make iron armor any other way. I recommend making some leather armor when your done.

quests.name: Combat
quests.description: Todays minecraft has a combat cooldown, but this modpack is SPECIAL, so instead you can go back to jitterclicking and butterfly clicking on mobs, you'll probably need it.

quests.name: So you don't want to die
quests.description: This is a repeatable quest, meaning you can come back and do the quest again. now go kill some zombies for hearts.
